qandaentry &qandaentry.purpose;
&qandaentry.synopsis.gen; Description
A QandAEntry is an entry in a QandASet. Each QandAEntry defines a Question and (possibly) its Answer or Answers.
Processing expectations
&format.block; Questions are usually presented before the Answers, and often the Answers are indented to make the questions stand out.
